SAINT BERNARD - 2018

Starring Jason Dugre, Katy Sullivan, Peter Iasillo Jr., Warwick Davis

Classical music conductor BERNARD (Jason Dugre) spirals into madness in akaleidascope of dream-like scenarios that reveal the mental fragility in all of us.

"There is a fine line between creativity and madness...that line has just been crossed."
